entry.title: Project Isekai
entry.summary:
Author: chevybrielle

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,270Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 0

Summary: Yes, I have written another one despite of having a some pending ones. Just need to get this out. This is my hand on writing something Isekai-ish.On a patrol night Damain Wayne spotted an unknown creature floating through Gotham. Naturally, he followed. And then got sucked into a world he wasn't expecting. Why he was taken there was the question and no one is giving him answers.Saved by a warrior, taken in by strangers , Damain must learn to cope with it all in order to find his way back to Gotham. If he can go back. Or if he wants to go back.(Names of places are slightly....i dont know, but bear with it.)

entry.title: Love bites
entry.summary:
Author: maybemusing247

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,865Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 177

Summary: Marinette's date night was not supposed to involve learning your boyfriend was a super hero.It was also not set to include creating a plan of action to make him regret saying stupid things.Was the amount of unbridled joy on Plagg's face concerning? Possibly.But the real concerning thing was that the grin she sported put Plagg's to shame.Robin never stood a chance.

entry.title: The Lies We Tell Ourselves
entry.summary:
Author: Rennielynn

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,228Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 92

Summary: Marinette was sent to live with an old friend of Lois’s when it became obvious that she didn’t have powers like her siblings. Oh how wrong they were. Now living in Paris under the name Marinette Dupain-Cheng, she decides to make the most of it and start over. Only, now she’s the guardian of the Miraculous, is Ladybug (Hero of Paris), and dealing with the fact that her powers don’t work well with magical jewelry. On top of that, Damian Wayne, her twins best friend, transfers into her class. Just great.

entry.title: Yours Truly
entry.summary:
Author: kleenextissues

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,191Chapters: 22/?Kudos: 1,792

Summary: When his brothers get it in their head that Damian Wayne needs more friends his own age (and species), he is unwittingly signed up for a Pen Pal website. He is matched with a girl in Paris who manages to worm her way into his heart, whether he likes it or not.Even though Marinette Dupain-Cheng has little time already, she decides that the best way to improve her English-speaking skills before going off to university is to sign up for a Pen Pal website. With all the hype she has heard from Alya, she is excited to make a new friend while expanding her resume. What she doesn't expect is to be matched with a gruff boy who wants nothing to do with her.Through pain, comfort, growth, and villains, they learn to rely on those that love them, and fall in love with each other in the process.

entry.title: A Failed Betrothal
entry.summary:
Author: Artemis_Chase

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 42,609Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 1,904

Summary: Damian doesn't want to get married since he is Robin, one of the many Protectors of Gotham City.So does Marinette because she is Ladybug, Leader of the Miraculous Team and has a supervillain on her hands.And the fact that both of them are also sixteen.Unfortunately, the League of Assassins doesn't care about such things and has kidnapped both of them for their wedding (plus Jason and Plagg for some reasons)Fortunately, they escaped before the ceremony even starts and ends up in Paris where Lila is stirring up trouble again.Adrien, after losing his miraculous and his memories of Chat Noir, is fixated on making Marinette his.

entry.title: The Future is Ahead of Us, Not Set in Stone
entry.summary:
Author: Zi_Xi_Zy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 95,993Chapters: 40/?Kudos: 516

Summary: In her final year of lycée, Marinette moves to Gotham for various reasons. Meanwhile, Damian Wayne, in his last year of high school, is ready to leave the Robin mantle behind and follow his own path away from his vigilante family.But as he steps away from one destiny, another reveals itself—one tied to the Miraculous, to the power of restoration, and to the girl who was never meant to wield the Ladybug Miraculous in the first place.When Marinette and Damian meet, it becomes undeniable: the roles they were forced into were never meant for them. She was born for the Black Cat. He was made for the Ladybug. And together, they must uncover the truth behind the Miraculous, the Order, and their own tangled legacies before it’s too late.

entry.title: Miraculous Sunshine
entry.summary:
Author: Scarlet_Rosen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 87,001Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 2,938

Summary: Following tropes and taking inspiration from more fics than I can name. All credit goes to rightfull owners including original trope ideas.Marinette wins a trip to Gotham for her class and they're there for an entire semester. Shenanigans insue that lead to eventual identities revealed, feelings becoming ever present, friendships to bloom, lies to come to light, emotions to become overwhelming, and eventually plenty of fluff. True holders have powers and marks. Adrien is not a true holder. The class is mentally, emotionally, and physically abusive to Marinette. Batfam will become very protective of Marinette the smol bean.Warning: Explicit Language will be used. If you are not okay with cursing then don't read this. They are teenagers getting ready to exit high school, they are gonna curse. Not to mention the Batfam and other adults cursing throughout.

entry.title: Graceful Shadow (New)
entry.summary:
Author: RavenDragon643

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,997Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 439

Summary: After Marinette's parents had enough of her lying about her bullying Lila, they send her to America to live with Sabine's old college friend, Lois Lane. Lois was happy to take in Marinette and she believed her. Now Marinette is trying to navigate her new life and maybe fall in love with a certain Robin. Will they stop Hawkmoth and Lila?
